EmailTemplate.name: Free Trial request_partners
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your interest in Tricentis Tosca
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!NullValue(Contact.FirstName, "Sir or Madam")},
Thank you for your interest in Tricentis Tosca.
I received notification that you recently requested a trial license. Can I answer any questions for you about Tricentis or Tosca? By way of introduction, my name is {!User.Name} and I am the {!User.Title}, exclusively supporting Global Service Integrators. In my role, I work with key stakeholders to develop an effective GSI strategy that’s mutually beneficial to both organizations.
In order to help you in your TOSCA journey, I’ve added a few items & links that will help you understand some of what we do as well as added a new document that discusses TOSCA position within Gartner’s Magic Quadrant.
Download fact sheets, case studies and whitepapers from our webpage at http://www.tricentis.com/resources/ Take our free online training at https://www.udemy.com/get-in-touch-with-tricentis-tosca-testsuite/ Submit for and download our 14 day trial license at http://www.tricentis.com/tricentis-tosca-testsuite/tosca-testsuite-trial/ Gartner's 2016 Magic Quadrant
Best regards, {!User.Name} {!User.Title}
Tricentis m - {!User.MobilePhone} e - {!User.Email}
Tricentis GmbH Company Headquarters: Saturn Tower, Leonard-Bernstein-Straße 10, 1220 Vienna FN 213896d Handelsgericht Wien
Tricentis US Headquarters, 5150 El Camino Real, Suite D14, Los Altos, CA 94022
